DataElement.preferredName: Anti-diarrheal Agent Current Cycle Used Other Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The name of another anti-diarrheal medication used by the patient that is not already specified.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Antidiarrheal Agent Current Therapy Cycle Other Use
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A pharmacological agent that may ameliorate the symptoms of diarrhetic illnesses._The name of the therapy that is currently being administered._An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._To put into action or service.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Miscellaneous agents found useful in the symptomatic treatment of diarrhea. They have no effect on the agent(s) that cause diarrhea, but merely alleviate the condition. (MeSH)

Concepts.definition: A pharmacological agent that may ameliorate the symptoms of diarrhetic illnesses.

Property.preferredDefinition: The name of the therapy that is currently being administered.:An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.:Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:To put into action or service.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).
